text: Walter Eduardo Cortés Pérez (born 5 February 2000) is a Costa Rican footballer who plays as a defender for Deportivo Saprissaa. ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Deportivo Saprissa players Category:Philadelphia Union II players Category:Liga FPD players Category:USL Championship players Category:Costa Rican expatriate footballers Category:Costa Rican footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Costa Rican expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States
title: Walter Cortés
